item.title: Download Loomer String 1.17.3
item.description: Loomer String is a virtual polyphonic string synthesizer plugin that emulates classic 1970s string synthesizers. Its authentic tones are created by accurately emulating the split oscillator technology used in iconic 1970s string synthesizers. String has two separate sound generation layers, each with three phase-locked oscillators tuned to different octave ranges, which can produce a rich and variable range of tones. item.title: Download Loomer Resound 1.9.1
item.description: Resound is a software audio delay effects processor that emulates the sound and behavior of classic tape echo devices. Controllable noise levels allow for just the right amount of grit, distortion, and flutter. item.title: Download Loomer Manifold 1.9.1
